measure.name: residential_hot_water_heater_tank
measure.description: This measure adds a new residential storage water heater to the model based on user inputs. If there is already an existing residential water heater in the model, it is replaced. For multifamily buildings, the water heater can be set for all units of the building. See https://github.com/NREL/resstock#workflows for supported workflows using this measure.
measure.modeler_description: The measure will create a new instance of the OS:WaterHeater:Mixed object representing a storage water heater. The water heater will be placed on the plant loop 'Domestic Hot Water Loop'. If this loop already exists, any water heater on that loop will be removed and replaced with a water heater consistent with this measure. If it doesn't exist, it will be created.

argument.name: fuel_type
argument.description: Type of fuel used for water heating.

argument.name: tank_volume
argument.description: Nominal volume of the of the water heater tank. Set to auto to have volume autosized.

argument.name: location
argument.description: The space type for the location. 'auto' will automatically choose a space type based on the space types found in the model.

argument.name: capacity
argument.description: The maximum energy input rating of the water heater. Set to auto to have this field autosized.

argument.name: energy_factor
argument.description: Ratio of useful energy output from the water heater to the total amount of energy delivered from the water heater. Enter auto for a water heater that meets the minimum federal efficiency requirements.

argument.name: recovery_efficiency
argument.description: Ratio of energy delivered to the water to the energy content of the fuel consumed by the water heater. Only used for non-electric water heaters.

argument.name: offcyc_power
argument.description: Off cycle electric power draw for controls, etc. Only used for non-electric water heaters.

argument.name: oncyc_power
argument.description: On cycle electric power draw from the forced draft fan motor. Only used for non-electric water heaters.

argument.name: has_water_heater_flue
argument.display_name: Air Leakage: Has Open Water Heater Flue
argument.description: Specifies whether the building has an open flue associated with the water heater.
